12-14 May 2017

The First Annual Spark Festival will be held in Gjakova.

info@sparkfestks.com

ABOUT



WHO WE ARE: We are from Kosovo and around the world. We organized this festival to bring new experiences in healing and wellness here and to the region. All of our teachers are experienced and well-known throughout the region and beyond.
The main focus of the festival is healing, renewal and regeneration for the local community as well as visitors.

Activities include yoga, pilates, reiki, meditation, lectures and other forms of self-healing, healthy living and practice.

We have as a core tenet, inclusiveness for all communities in Gjakova and Kosovo. We would like the entire community to be able to take part and benefit from the festival in as many ways possible. We also believe in environmental awareness and encourage recycling and protection of the planet.

WHAT DOES HOLISTIC MEAN? It means whole body wellness and health, inside and out.
